title: What are the pros and cons of information, communication, and technology? - Quora

response.answer_text: Pros: - Reach most friends, family and business contacts in seconds. - Develop a business line without needing a real office. - Fast development and less time to market. - Lower prices on communications to consumers. - Real time interaction with other information systems. - Home and daily tasks automation. - Asking questions with a million people willing to help out.  Cons: - No reliable trusted sources. Information might not be accurate. - Communicating over a distance might degrade the human approach to relations - The mind has become lazy, not reading the entire page but going straight to the interesting part. - Reduced privacy - A faster world based on technology reduces the amount of time to be with ourselves.

Communication speed/time – money can be spared on the grounds that it's much faster to move information around. With the assistance of ICT it has turned out to be snappier and more productive to contact either a business or relative. We can now compare with anybody around the world by essentially text messaging them, or sending them an email, for a practically momentary reaction. The wide accessibility of the web has additionally opened up eye to eye direct communication from almost anyplace on the planet. In spite of the fact that information technology may have made communication faster, simpler, and more helpful, it has likewise brought along protection issues. From cell phone signal block attempts to email hacking, individuals are presently agonized over their once private information getting to be public knowledge.
